Lint/RedundantSafeNavigation.description:
Description

Checks for redundant safe navigation calls.
Lint/RedundantSafeNavigation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowedMethods: ['instance_of?', 'kind_of?', 'is_a?', 'eql?', 'respond_to?', 'equal?'] (type: list)
InferNonNilReceiver: False (type: bool)
AdditionalNilMethods: ['present?', 'blank?', 'try', 'try!'] (type: list)
